# GitHub Copilot Instructions â€“ Quick Reference

**For complete agent guidelines, read:** `/AGENTS.md` or `/AGENT_START_HERE.md`

This project is a mobile-first tower-defense idle game with vanilla JavaScript. All detailed instructions, conventions, and workflows are in the main AGENTS.md file and context-specific agent.md files throughout the repository.

## Essential Quick Links

- **Start here:** `/AGENT_START_HERE.md` - Universal navigation for all tasks
- **Main guide:** `/AGENTS.md` - Vision, aesthetics, coding conventions
- **Module system:** `/docs/JAVASCRIPT_MODULE_SYSTEM.md`
- **Mobile-first:** `/docs/PLATFORM_SUPPORT.md`

## Key Principles

- **Mobile-first:** Test portrait orientation on mobile viewport first
- **Minimal changes:** Make smallest possible edits to achieve goals
- **Mathematical theme:** Greek letters, scholarly fonts, chalk-on-blackboard aesthetic
- **No build step:** Open `index.html` directly to test
- **ES6 modules:** Explicit imports, no globals

Navigate to context-specific agent.md files (e.g., `scripts/core/agent.md` for utilities) for detailed guidance on any subsystem.
